comment: Took him for Environmental Lab. He made the lab was harder than the lecture class. 2 midterms and a project for the lab. Class average on the first midterm was 48%.

If you can take someone else, take them. I didn't like him as a teacher. He won't answer your questions and tries to fail you. He wants very specific stuff in your reports, but doesn't clarify what. He expects us to stand in lab for 3 hours while he lectures, but he sits in a chair the entire time. He counts the last lab twice and didn't tell us.

Do not take this professor as he pretty much just tells you right off the bat that you're on your own in this class, however, the manual contains no procedures or steps to do in the lab, he's not teaching you, but he sure is quick to holler and scream at students over something that they didn't necessarily do wrong, but that was not specified.
